patterns: How do I allocate a case?
Can I assign a patient to a therapist?
I need to allocate a new case
How do I start a new case?
responses: You can allocate a case by navigating to the 'Case Allocation' page, where you can assign patients to therapists.

patterns: How do I create a therapy plan?
I need to prepare a therapy plan
Where can I set therapy goals?
How do I start planning therapy?
responses: To create a therapy plan, go to the 'Therapy Plan' page where you can set goals and activities for your patients.

patterns: How do I review a therapy plan?
Where can I give feedback on a therapy plan?
I need to approve a therapy plan
How do I provide input on a therapy plan?
responses: You can review and provide input on therapy plans by visiting the 'Supervisor Review' page.

patterns: How do I write a progress report?
I need to submit a therapy progress report
Where can I update therapy progress?
How do I document therapy sessions?
responses: Progress reports can be created and submitted on the 'Progress Report' page after completing at least ten therapy sessions.

patterns: How do I evaluate a therapy case?
Where can I provide clinical ratings?
I need to evaluate therapy outcomes
How do I assess therapy effectiveness?
responses: You can perform clinical evaluations and provide ratings on the 'Clinical Evaluation' page.

patterns: How do I give feedback?
I want to submit a complaint
Can I provide suggestions?
Where do I report an issue?
responses: Feedback and complaints can be submitted through the 'Feedback' page.

patterns: How do I create an account?
I'm having trouble logging in
Can I update my profile?
How do I reset my password?
responses: To create an account, go to the 'Sign-Up' page. For logging in issues, try resetting your password or visit the 'Login Help' page.

responses: I'm here to help! What do you need assistance with?
